title: Poro King mode Lag
body:
Been happening for the past 2 days now. Every time when I play poro king mode, i get screen freeze and delays (while my ping and fps remain constant). It happens more often, especially when the poro king {{summoner:30}}  is summoned.  

Normal and aram modes are fine.

replies.body:
I'd need a recording to be sure, but it sounds like you're experiencing pretty typical symptoms of *Packet Loss* or extreme buffering. I'd strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm your local network settings are compatible with League before we investigate further.

Please let me know if you experience these issues again after working through those steps.
